abstract: New York City Education Dept investigation reveals administrators at Boys and Girls High School in Brooklyn, including Principal Michael Wiltshire, failed to report allegations of criminal behavior by students, including charges of sexual harassment; findings deal yet another blow to efforts to revive school, which is firmly grounded in community of Bedford-Stuyvesant but has history of low performance.

headline.print_headline: Inquiry Faults School’s Administrators  in Sexual Harassment and Theft Cases
headline.main: High School’s Administrators Faulted in Sexual Harassment and Theft Cases

keywords.value: Boys and Girls High School (Brooklyn, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: An investigation found that administrators failed to report the matters at the long-struggling Boys and Girls High School in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: An investigation found that administrators failed to report the matters at the long-struggling Boys and Girls High School in Brooklyn.
